author: JamesWTruher
body:
Improve coverage for Clear-Content content command.

```powershell
PS> $r1 = Get-CodeCoverage ..\..\Coverage.xml; $r2 = Get-CodeCoverage ..\..\ClearContent.xml
PS> Compare-CodeCoverage -Run1 $r1 -Run2 $r2 -class Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.ClearContentCommand

ClassName                                         Sequence SequenceDelta Branch BranchDelta
---------                                         -------- ------------- ------ -----------
Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.ClearContentCommand    89.47         31.58    100          20
```

comments.author: lzybkr
comments.body: You have infrastructure changes and new tests in the same commit - this should ideally be either 2 PRs or at least 2 commits.

title: Provide class level coverage data via OpenCover module
